column2: [This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to amass a substantial amount of wealth
[This.GetTitledFirstName] would like to treat with foreign dignitaries in the court of [This.GetPossPronoun] liege.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] would like a seat on the [This.Liege.GetCouncilName] of [This.GetHerHis] liege.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants [This.GetHerHis] name to live forever in the annals of history.
With the current heir being ill fit to rule, [This.GetTitledFirstName] thinks [This.GetSubjectPronoun] should be the prime candidate in line.

[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to become [Root.GetKingQueen] of [This.Capital.Kingdom.GetName]. If pagan, with succession laws set to Elective Gavelkind, it allows [This.GetObjectPronoun] the unlimited use of the Subjugation Casus Belli within the kingdom. If the Fabricate Claims councilor mission is available, it may acquire a claim on [This.Capital.Kingdom.GetName] with this ambition. There is also a reduced cost for creating the [This.Capital.Kingdom.GetTier] if it does not yet exist.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] dreams of leading troops in the service of [This.GetPossPronoun] liege.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] strives to improve [This.GetHerHis] [This.Religion.GetPietyName] and become enlightened, an inspiration to all of [This.GetHerHis] faith.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] strives to become a beacon of chivalry and honor - a paragon of virtue.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] would like to advise [This.GetPossPronoun] liege in spiritual matters.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] loves intrigue and would like to put [This.GetPossPronoun] skills to formal use.
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted [buddhist.GetName], is trying to learn to abstain from excesses of the flesh.
Learn to Abstain from Excesses of the Flesh
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted [buddhist.GetName], is trying to learn to defeat [This.GetHerHis] fear of the world and of the designs of others.
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted [buddhist.GetName], is trying to learn to reject cruelty.
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted [buddhist.GetName], is trying to learn to reject emply pleasures.
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted [buddhist.GetName], is trying to learn to reject the poison that envy brings to the mind.
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted [buddhist.GetName], is trying to learn to reject the poison that greed brings to the mind.
Learn to Reject the Poison of Greed
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted [buddhist.GetName], is trying to learn to reject the poison that hate and anger brings to the mind.
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted [buddhist.GetName], is trying to learn to reject pride.
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted [buddhist.GetName], is trying to learn to abandon [This.GetHerHis] harmful drinking habits.
[This.GetTitledFirstName], as a devoted [buddhist.GetName], is trying to learn to eat without excess.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to build a war chest and prepare [This.GetHerHis] realm for war!
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to gather artifacts to put in [GetHerHis] empty treasury.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to build a glorious building of great prestige!
Focus your efforts to immortalize your name and ensure that all your descendants will share in your fame.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to acquire more land and another title, increasing [This.GetHerHis] influence and power in the realm.

[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to have a child and see them reach adulthood.

If [This.GetFirstName]'s Inheritance Law is ¬ßYAgnatic¬ß!, only a male child will fulfill this ambition. Similarly, if [This.GetFirstName]'s Inheritance Law is ¬ßYEnatic¬ß!, only a female child will do.

While active ¬ßYFertility¬ß! is increased by ¬ßG20%¬ß!, and once your child reaches ¬ßY12¬ß! years, you may choose to ¬ßGright-click¬ß! their portrait and choose to ¬ßYIntroduce Heir to Realm¬ß!.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Diplomacy, since it is poor (lower than ¬ßY8¬ß!).
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Intrigue, since it is poor (lower than ¬ßY8¬ß!).
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Learning, since it is poor (lower than ¬ßY8¬ß!).
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Martial ability, since it is poor (lower than ¬ßY8¬ß!).
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to improve [This.GetHerHis] Stewardship, since it is poor (lower than ¬ßY8¬ß!).
Gain Land for an Unlanded Daughter
You wish to secure some land for a daughter that is currently not set to inherit any.
Gain Land for an Unlanded Daughter
You wish to secure some land for a son that is currently not set to inherit any.
Gain Land for an Unlanded Son
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to lower the decadence of [This.GetHerHis] dynasty, as its value is above 60.
The ambitious [This.GetTitledFirstName] thinks that marrying a heir would be a good way to secure the future.
The ambitious [This.GetTitledFirstName] thinks that marrying a ruler would be an excellent way to climb the social ladder.

[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to see [This.GetHerHis] realm prosper by staying at peace for ¬ßY5 years¬ß!.

If [This.GetFirstName]'s realm is attacked or [This.GetSheHe] goes to war, this ambition will fail and can't be taken again for ¬ßY5 years¬ß!.

While this ambition is active, ¬ßYGlobal Revolt Risk¬ß! is reduced by ¬ßY1%¬ß!.

[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to see the authority of the ¬ßY[Root.Religion.GetName]¬ß! Religion strengthened, as it is currently below ¬ßY30%¬ß!.\n\nWhile this Ambition is active, [This.GetTitledFirstName] might be presented with special war opportunities.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to be granted a fief of [This.GetPossPronoun] own.
